entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:16 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 07:16 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:16 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
